text: Kyiv International Short Film Festival (KISFF) is an annual festival, held in Kyiv and aimed at acquainting audiences with short films from around the world. Latest movies, winners of international festivals, retrospectives of extraordinary figures and special attention to modern and classic Ukrainian movies all feature in the festival. KISFF also organizes projects and events to develop a diversity of short films in Ukraine. Anti-clerical film «Kissing Hank's Ass» was shown on festival in 2015Українські учасники KISFF 2015The 4th Kyiv International Short Film Festival == Jury == The festival jury is elected by administration of the festival. Usually there are several foreign guests and representatives of Ukrainian cinema. The jury members are prominent directors, producers and filmmakers that have received international awards. == External links == * Official website == References== Category:2012 establishments in Ukraine Category:Mass media in Kyiv Category:Film festivals in Ukraine Category:Short film festivals Category:Annual events in Ukraine Category:Recurring events established in 2012 Category:Spring (season) events in Ukraine
title: Kyiv International Short Film Festival
